```{css}
.column {
  float: left;
  width: 45%;
  margin-left: 1rem;
}
/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}
#lightgallery > a > img:hover {
   transform: scale(1.15, 1.15);
   transition: 0.4s ease-in-out;
   cursor: pointer;
}
```




```{r}
# Create layout
images <- tibble::tibble(
  images_thumb = fs::dir_ls(here::here("images/gallery/thumbnails")),
  images_full_size = fs::dir_ls(here::here("images/gallery/large"))
  )

img_html <- tagList(purrr::map2(images$images_thumb, images$images_full_size, function(t, l) {
    tags$a(
      href = l,
      tags$img(src = t)
    )
}))


withTags(
  div(
    class = "row",
    id = "lightgallery",
    img_html
  )
)

```


<script type="text/javascript">
    lightGallery(document.getElementById('lightgallery'), {
      hideBarsDelay: 1500
    }); 
</script>
